security_audit.summary: Pure documentation/markdown file containing workflow instructions for AI agents. Contains no executable code, network operations, filesystem access, or environment variable reading. The file describes a legitimate REST API development process using TDD methodology.

content.user_title: Build production REST APIs with AI agents
content.value_statement: Building REST APIs from scratch requires coordinating multiple specialists across backend, database, testing, and DevOps. This skill provides a complete 2-week workflow that coordinates AI agents to design, implement, test, document, and deploy production-ready APIs using test-driven development.
actual_capabilities: Coordinates 8-12 AI agents across planning, design, implementation, testing, and deployment phases
Creates OpenAPI 3.0 specifications and database schemas with proper relationships and indexes
Implements TDD cycles with unit, integration, E2E, performance, and security tests
Sets up CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions, Docker containers, and blue-green deployment
Generates complete API documentation including Swagger UI, developer guides, and operations runbooks
limitations: Requires Claude Code subscription and appropriate agent access
Execution depends on available agent types in your Claude setup
Provides workflow guidance only; actual code generation depends on agent capabilities

use_cases.title: Ship APIs on schedule
use_cases.description: Coordinate team of AI agents to build production REST APIs within 2-week sprints using proven TDD workflow

use_cases.title: Accelerate API delivery
use_cases.description: Automate API development lifecycle from requirements to deployment with integrated testing and documentation

use_cases.title: Automate deployment
use_cases.description: Set up CI/CD pipelines, monitoring, and blue-green deployment with pre-configured validation checks

prompt_templates.title: New API project
prompt_templates.prompt: Use sop-api-development skill to build a new REST API for [PROJECT_NAME]. Requirements: [LIST REQUIREMENTS]

prompt_templates.title: Add endpoints
prompt_templates.prompt: Add new endpoints to existing REST API. Follow TDD cycle: create tests first at [TEST_PATH], then implement at [IMPL_PATH]

prompt_templates.title: Setup CI/CD
prompt_templates.prompt: Set up CI/CD pipeline for REST API project using GitHub Actions, Docker, and blue-green deployment strategy

prompt_templates.title: Security audit
prompt_templates.prompt: Run security testing on existing REST API following OWASP API Security Top 10. Include SQL injection, XSS, and RBAC validation

output_examples.input: Build a user management REST API for a SaaS application
output: Day 1-2: Requirements gathering and API design (OpenAPI 3.0 spec created)
Day 3-8: Implementation with TDD (8 endpoints, 90%+ test coverage)
Day 9-11: Comprehensive testing (E2E, performance, security tests passed)
Day 12-14: Deployment to production with monitoring and documentation

best_practices: Follow TDD cycle: write tests first, implement to pass tests, then refactor
Store all artifacts in memory namespaces for agent coordination
Run security scans and performance benchmarks before deployment
anti_patterns: Skipping documentation or test writing for speed
Deploying without security audit or code review
Implementing endpoints without following the TDD cycle

faq.question: What does this skill do?
faq.answer: Provides a complete workflow for building REST APIs with AI agents using test-driven development over 2 weeks.

faq.question: Which AI tools are supported?
faq.answer: Fully compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Requires Claude Code subscription for full agent coordination.

faq.question: How long does API development take?
faq.answer: The skill outlines a 2-week timeline. Actual duration depends on API complexity and available agent resources.

faq.question: What security measures are included?
faq.answer: Security testing includes OWASP checks, SQL injection tests, XSS vulnerability scans, and RBAC validation.

faq.question: Can I customize the workflow?
faq.answer: Yes. Modify phases, agent types, test requirements, and deployment strategy to match your project needs.

faq.question: What prerequisites are needed?
faq.answer: Claude Code subscription, access to appropriate agent types, and environment for running tests and deployments.
